# nginx.conf 配置

# nginx配置

  • 1.如果不配置证书，即http，那么需要监听80端口，配置方式如下：
    server{
        listen 80;
        server_name master.fangxinqian.cn #这里是你的域名
        root /user/local/webserver/nginx/html/hlw-manage #前端界面所在目录，vue是打包成一个index.html，静态文件放在oss
        index index.html index.htm;
        try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html; #此处需要加，不然可能会报404
        error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html; #配置异常页面，跳nginx的异常页面
        error_page 405 =200 http://$host$request_uri;
        #jar代理指定的接口
        location /system {
            proxy_pass  http://localhost:8099;
            proxy_http_version 1.1;
            proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
            proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
            proxy_read_timeout 600s;
        }
        location /manage {
            proxy_pass  http://localhost:8099;
            proxy_http_version 1.1;
            proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
            proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
            proxy_read_timeout 600s;
        }
        location /open {
            proxy_pass  http://localhost:8099;
            proxy_http_version 1.1;
            proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
            proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
            proxy_read_timeout 600s;
        }
    }

  • 2.配置ssl证书，监听443端口，并且同时监听着80端口，把80端口的请求重定向到443端口，配置如下：
    #配置监听80端口
    server{
        listen 80;
        server_name master.fangxinqian.cn #这里是你的域名
        rewrite ^(.*) https://$server_name$1 permanent; #重定向80端口接收到的请求到443端口进行处理
    }

    #配置监听443端口
    #server {
             listen       443 ssl;
             server_name  master.fangxinqian.cn;
             ssl on;
             ssl_certificate      ssl/fangxinqian.cn.cer;
             ssl_certificate_key  ssl/fangxinqian.cn.key;
             root /usr/local/webserver/nginx/html/hlw-manage;
             index index.html index.htm;
             try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html; #此处需要加，不然可能会报404
             error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
             error_page 405 =200 https://$host$request_uri;
             #此处配置可以根据前端具体请求登录地址而定，如果是/ 那么不需要代理到jar里面进行后台接口请求
            # location / {
              # root /usr/local/webserver/nginx/html/hlw-manage;
              # index index.html index.htm loginindex;
              # try_files $uri $uri/ /index.html;
               #error_page 405 =200 http://$host$request_uri;
               #proxy_pass  http://127.0.0.1:8099;
               #proxy_http_version 1.1;
               #proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
               #proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
               #proxy_read_timeout 600s;
            #}
            location /system{
              proxy_pass  http://127.0.0.1:8099;
              proxy_http_version 1.1;
              proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
              proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
              proxy_read_timeout 600s;
              error_page 405 =200 http://$host$request_uri;
            }
            location /open{
              proxy_pass  http://127.0.0.1:8099;
              proxy_http_version 1.1;
              proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
              proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
              proxy_read_timeout 600s;
              error_page 405 =200 http://$host$request_uri;
            }
            location /manage{
               proxy_pass  http://127.0.0.1:8099;
               proxy_http_version 1.1;
               proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
               proxy_set_header Connection "upgrade";
               proxy_read_timeout 600s;
               error_page 405 =200 http://$host$request_uri;
            }
            location ~* \.(eot|ttf|woff|woff2|svg)$ {
               add_header Access-Control-Allow-Origin *;
               add_header Access-Control-Allow-Headers X-Requested-With;
               add_header Access-Control-Allow-Methods GET,POST,OPTIONS;
               add_header Content-Security-Policy upgrade-insecure-requests;
            }
        }

这里是把前端的访问页面的请求放开不走反向代理，为了统一不重复配置，可以在后端接口加一个别名，
然后这里配置
location /别名 {
.....
反向代理相关配置
负载均衡相关配置
}
location / {


}
